forum.name: progress of a hobbo
forum.description: some way of letting you guys know i'm not just doing nothing.
forum.latestCommentText: it isn't important that i continue this to its last stage, it would only weigh down on me with all these other things i want to impliment.

thread.title: what a clown

comments.text: doesn't this idiot not know what -insert popular communication platform- is? why is he wasting his time using a clunky message board you can only view ingame?
why did he put a waterfall over the board itself so it partly blocks the first comments?
are these things around the board real areas? why can't i find them? what's the point in putting them here if i can't even visit them?
my 4 year old has better english skills than this guy.
did he just waste an entire day making a duck avitar? how is this helping in any way with his unfinished projects?
you'd think he'd use the 9+hours a day to get something done but he still hasn't finished even a second map yet.
more than 3 months to get his halloween project finished and he only just returned a week before the deadline. litteraly nothing about this is worth staying around for.
he could have finished any one of his new avitars in 1 day but he chooses to sit around half the time and just stare at it instead. get on with it already!
what sort of person calls themselves an "elemental" and doesnt even have any scripted abilitys? most people already have 3 in the first 2 weeks. lazy shit.
half of his maps just require him to make dirt caves and landscapes. dude literally literally can't even get around to doing a kindergarden level task. privilaged shit stain.
he said he would make a youtube channel last week, it's almost the end of this week. is it really that fucking difficult to make an account or is he just incredibly incompident?
its a good 7 months since you did anything on this game and you still cant get your dumbass in gear. what the heck is wrong with you?
after all this time you never learn do you? all these distractions stopping you from finishing anything at all. you just made 2 new areas as well? what the hell is wrong with you?

thread.latestCommentText: after all this time you never learn do you? all these distractions stopping you from finishing anything at all. you just made 2 new areas as well? what the hell is wrong with you?
